m_szDocSumamry: Login Sign up Search Expert Search Quick Search Patents/Apps Non-Patent Literature SEARCH RESEARCH MPEP 2.0 TOOLS & RESOURCES ACCLAIM IP HELP Title: SYSTEM AND METHOD OF PROVIDING WEATHER INFORMATION United States Patent Application 20150168167 Kind Code: A1 Abstract: A system and a method of providing weather information to a driver of a vehicle along a desired route are provided. The method includes setting, by a controller, the desired route from a current position of a vehicle to a destination and transmitting information regarding the desired route to a telematics server.
